name: Forge Rewards
headline: Starbucks app for restaurants

founders.name: Ethan Chang, Founder
founders.description: Changing how restaurant run, prev Stanford

founders.name: Isaac Kan, Founder
founders.description: Studied CS at Stanford and interned at Stanford Med, building CNN models. I'm now a co-founder of Forge, where we're transforming how restaurants build their brand and online presence.

##### The Starbucks app for the best restaurant brands
All-in-one platform for managing your restaurant's entire diner experience
[Get started now!](https://www.joinforge.app/<https:/www.joinforge.app/partner>)
![Website Screens.png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/ff2d45_d93ed0a399064387be6d6fd0f3f9a54e~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_366,h_347,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/Website%20Screens.png)
​
Forge is the social commerce suite to connect & engage with your patrons, made for restaurant hospitality brands. 
## Trusted by hundreds of leading restaurant brands 
## We help food & beverage creators engage with guests in new ways — and build impactful, new revenue digitally
![splash.png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/ff2d45_dbc288915ccb457798bee492809a9928~mv2.png/v1/crop/x_794,y_0,w_2071,h_1618/fill/w_253,h_253,fp_0.50_0.50,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/splash.png)
![niku_steakhuose.jpg](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/ff2d45_afbd355e5e4841e1b172f2281c3477ff~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_262,h_253,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/niku_steakhuose.jpg)
![daeho.jpg](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/ff2d45_0ac9753bfed444a99f60004537354062~mv2.jpg/v1/crop/x_512,y_0,w_1280,h_1280/fill/w_253,h_253,fp_0.50_0.50,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/daeho.jpg)
## [Join 1700+ members at ](https://www.joinforge.app/<https:/apps.apple.com/us/app/chubby-club/id6479624665>) [Mikiya Shabu House](https://www.joinforge.app/<https:/apps.apple.com/us/app/chubby-club/id6479624665>)
## [Experience monthly tastings with](https://www.joinforge.app/<https:/apps.apple.com/us/app/chubby-club/id6479624665>) [Niku Steakhouse](https://www.joinforge.app/<https:/apps.apple.com/us/app/chubby-club/id6479624665>)
## Get rewarded when you visit [Daeho Kalbijjim](https://www.joinforge.app/<https:/apps.apple.com/us/app/daeho-rewards/id6517353978>)
###### Instant Payments
Get paid upfront immediately. We'll handle the financing terms and guarantees so you can focus on your cashflow. 
###### Digital Ordering
Track orders & help your sales reps via direct chat with your vendors. Customer ordering is as easy as checking out on Amazon with an AI-assistant. 
Make your sales reps life easier. Track the status of you customers, their past orders, and more, to keep them in your sales funnel. 
###### Market Expansion
Get access to mark to our larger clientele base from Michelin-level restaurant groups, local mom and pops, sport facilities, universities, and growing franchises. 
###### AI CRM for Sales
![](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/f69300_d83639ac8eba4abb90c38e8c2d1de340~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_48,h_16,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/CRM.png)
Revolutionize your operations with digitzed tech and unparalleled efficiency
##### THE ULTIMATE PLATFORM FOR FOOD DISTRIBUTORS
![](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/ff2d45_eeb8f9dadb964400a9593f4270ac7b14~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_49,h_26,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/Screenshot%202024-05-15%20at%2012_01_34%E2%80%AFPM.png)
###### Digital Loyalty
Set up digital loyalty programs in <1 minute to improve customer retention & drive recurring revenue.
![](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/f69300_4034484516e8435484f10e8a3b17a2ee~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_49,h_50,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/Group%2040217%20\(1\).png)
Forge makes the purchasing experience 10x better to increase your sales by 18%
##### THE EASIEST WAY FOR YOUR BUYERS TO ORDER
## Make it easy for your buyers to buy and re-order with digital baskets that remember previous orders. No more paperwork, no more painful calls, no more cross-communication errors.
## Drive Repeat Traffic
## Customers can browse your rich catalog 24/7 with descriptions, details & robust AI-driven search. We also let you send automated product recommendations & promos to drive sales. 
## Boost Your Sales
![](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/f69300_c68f9d8c669b48ea90d5ae808d0a666a~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_49,h_31,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/Group%2040215.png)
## Get delivery alerts and monitor orders & routes in real-time. No more "Where's my truck?" calls and costly errors. 
## Track Orders In Real-Time
![](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/f69300_c5aa3023ba3b4b9284460eb10d2a1ef0~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_85,h_80,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/Order%20Tracking.png)
![](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/f69300_e228d3e6fd1d40f6a84780db517b67b3~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_49,h_18,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/groceries.png)
![](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/ff2d45_7088ceb955364f91b8a7aa62b51dabeb~mv2.png/v1/crop/x_1,y_0,w_1826,h_1074/fill/w_49,h_29,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/Group%2044.png)
## Forge's AI co-pilot helps your buyers get what they need in less than 10 seconds. Your catalog and client inbox supports language-translation so anyone can buy or sell, anywhere. 
## Sell Anywhere
![](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/f69300_be0bc5d2cfc04f9f8aeb78da140592c3~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_49,h_28,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/distributorscreen%20\(1\).png)
  * Is Forge a marketplace?
## No, Forge is not a marketplace. Suppliers can onboard their existing customers onto Forge to streamline ordering and inventory control.
  * How does Forge empower distributors?
## Operational Efficiency: Consolidate and digitize your ordering process to reduce manual work and errors. Our AI-powered workflow lets you do more with less effort.
## Predictive Analytics: Stay ahead of the game by using data insights to forecast demand and optimize inventory. 
  * How much does Forge cost?
## Forge is free for restaurants to use. We offer different pricing plans for suppliers based on your needs. If you want to learn more, please contact us!


## FAQ
## Backed by the best
![](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/ff2d45_5c7c703840774ecaabd48817fc76cc21~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_49,h_14,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/ff2d45_5c7c703840774ecaabd48817fc76cc21~mv2.png)
![](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/ff2d45_d5934541782d409a8b4045b27e9c814c~mv2.png/v1/crop/x_470,y_0,w_850,h_988/fill/w_24,h_28,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/image.png)
![ORG_hello.png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/ff2d45_1ede05d4e33a4077be893e34b60c4e9c~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_49,h_24,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/ORG_hello.png)
![](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/ff2d45_df6710cf557c4b0b863fc0ea8c8de50d~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_49,h_29,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/image.png)
##### READY TO GET STARTED?
[Schedule Now](https://www.joinforge.app/<https:/www.joinforge.app/partner>)
We help you launch your own platform, drive top bottom line, and engage with your guests — made for exceptional hospitality
![](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/ff2d45_d5934541782d409a8b4045b27e9c814c~mv2.png/v1/crop/x_470,y_0,w_850,h_988/fill/w_111,h_129,fp_0.50_0.50,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/image.png)
## Backed by the best
![](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/ff2d45_5c7c703840774ecaabd48817fc76cc21~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_199,h_57,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/ff2d45_5c7c703840774ecaabd48817fc76cc21~mv2.png)
![michelin-removebg-preview.png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/ff2d45_2369ac915726439f860c28575108811d~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_110,h_76,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/michelin-removebg-preview.png)
![ORG_hello.png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/ff2d45_1ede05d4e33a4077be893e34b60c4e9c~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_181,h_88,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/ORG_hello.png)
![](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/9d9332_f066ca42f6864d458de1366592e24502~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_49,h_49,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/white_sticker.png)

##### HOW IT WORKS
Getting started is quick and easy
1
## Digitize Your Catalog
## Easily upload your product catalog with our AI. You can update your prices in real-time. Instantly set custom prices & create customized order guides for each buyer. 
2
## Invite Your Buyers
## Seamlessly onboard your existing customers to your digital Amazon-like storefront and start receiving orders that sync with your ERP. 
3
## AI-CRM: Monitor and Manage Orders
## Keep track of all incoming orders and keep in touch with your buyers through a centralized inbox. Confirm orders via chat, track status, & get paid immediately. 
![](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/f69300_009ac71f639e4100955b4cfd592540d8~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_75,h_90,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/Buyers.png)

generated_description:
### Forge Rewards Overview

**Company Name**: Forge Rewards  
**Founded**: 2023  
**Location**: San Francisco, CA  
**Team Size**: 2 employees  
**Y Combinator Batch**: W24  
**Website**: [Join Forge](https://www.joinforge.app/)  
**Group Partner**: Dalton Caldwell  

**Mission**: Think of Forge Rewards as the Starbucks app for restaurants. Their goal is to create an all-in-one platform designed to enhance the diner experience at various restaurant brands.

#### What They Do
Forge Rewards is essentially a social commerce suite tailored for the restaurant industry. They focus on:

- **Instant Payments**: Restaurants get paid upfront, allowing them to focus on cash flow without worrying about financing terms.
- **Digital Ordering**: Consumers can order as easily as they do on platforms like Amazon, thanks to AI assistance and features like order tracking and direct vendor chat.
- **Market Expansion**: They connect clients to a broad customer base, including Michelin-star restaurants, local establishments, sports facilities, and universities.
- **An AI-Driven CRM**: This helps streamline operations by providing insights that lead to enhanced efficiency.

#### Key Features
- **Digital Loyalty Programs**: Restaurants can implement loyalty programs quickly to improve customer retention.
- **Customizable Ordering**: Restaurants can create tailored order guides that simplify the purchasing process for buyers, making it easier for them to remember past orders.
- **Analytics**: Forge uses data insights to help restaurants predict demand and optimize inventory management.

Forge is designed to not only make the purchasing experience better—claiming a potential 18% increase in sales—but also to facilitate real-time order tracking and automate promotional recommendations.

#### Market Position
With tags like 'artificial intelligence', 'fintech', and 'food-tech', Forge is well-positioned to leverage technology in the restaurant industry. They are backed by Y Combinator and have gained traction with well-known restaurant brands, proving they have something valuable to offer.

In a nutshell, Forge Rewards is carving a niche in the restaurant ecosystem by combining advanced technology with a deep understanding of diner and restaurant needs. It's about making the dining experience seamless and engaging—both for guests and the businesses serving them.
